name: Camille
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: We arrived at Atlas Resorts during Ramadan and the staff was really welcoming, offering us to share their special marocain soup, with oilve oil, olive and bread. The location is beautiful, with a view on the Atlas mountain. This is a perfect place for a stop on your way to Tizzi n'Tichka and Ourzazate ! We will come back for sure !

name: Nine_ja
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: They upgraded us right upon our arrival because the suite was available. The suite are very very spacious, the view from the patio of the suite is amazing (when you have the one upstairs). You can enjoy a beautiful sunset in the mountain. The diner was really good, with lots of things to eat.

name: Irene
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: If you want to be in Marrakech this is not super handy, I mean, the Médina is not gonna be outside your door, but you’ll be surrounded by green. In our case it was perfect, we were driving back from the south and we needed a nice place to rest for the night. The staff welcomed us super politely, the room was big, clean and super comfortable, the breakfast one of the tastier I had, and the structure is surrounded by nature. If you want to visit Marrakech without going inside the city with the car, which I suggest not to do, this is perfect!

name: Jacques
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: We liked the hot shower and the heater was excellent. The bathroom was clean.

name: Jan
text: Large and clean room with air-conditioning, beautiful garden with swimming pool, kind staff guys welcome you with coffee & tea, free parking directly in resort area.

name: Abdelhak
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: Staff went out of their way to assist us with planning our time in Morocco which was really helpful. Our room was comfy and the terrace was lovely to relax on(Large and clean room with air-conditioning, beautiful garden with swimming pool.) Breakfast was good and dinner was delicious, Almost everything was perfect....The location was good if you want visited marakch or wazazat and The People from the Village were easy making contact.

name: Tobias
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: Pool was good but after we had a look at the room, we thought the water might not be hygienic. The dinner we had was great and cheap

name: Noam
room_type: Superior Double or Twin Room with Mountain View
text: The staff is very friendly. Location is great. We got what ever specials we asked to eat. Very clean place, wonderful design. Really excellent.

name: Daniel
text: Great location. Fantastic staff. What a wonderful place. Great roof terrace. Treated like friends
